acSubtitle: Hi Name, We recently emailed you to let you knwo we are rolling out the new VPN, this is to let you know we plan on installing it on ##/##/##
acMain: Here's everything you need to know about the Install
acHeader1: We will be installing the VPN remotely to your device, so there's not much for you to do
actext2: The Installation will happen first thing on the installation date, and you will recieve a Notification after the install is completed asking you to restart. Once your device has restarted you will ready to use the VPN.
acHeader3: All we need from you before your installation :
actext3: Check that any file that you use on the Remote are saved on your deivce.
actext4: Check that your Diary that and check you don't have any Important Teams Calls/Meetings first thing.
actext5: Ensure that your device has had all the most recent Microsoft Updates. Generally the Laptop will update automatically, but ensure it has restarted before Installation date.
acTextCTA: If this date is not convienvent or you are on Annual Leave, please let us know.
